# Home

###  [ Nature of Home ](http://web.archive.org/web/20260114090402/https://mmfa.org/exhibition/nature-of-home/)

May 2, 2025, through February 22, 2026  
On view in the Studio Hub

[ ](http://web.archive.org/web/20260114090402/https://mmfa.org/exhibition/art-crawl-seasons-change/)

###  [ Art Crawl: Seasons Change ](http://web.archive.org/web/20260114090402/https://mmfa.org/exhibition/art-crawl-seasons-change/)

November 14, 2025 through February 8, 2026  
On view in the Wilson Gallery

[ ](http://web.archive.org/web/20260114090402/https://mmfa.org/exhibition/untamed-canvas/)

###  [ Untamed Canvas ](http://web.archive.org/web/20260114090402/https://mmfa.org/exhibition/untamed-canvas/)

December 19, 2025, through May 31, 2026  
On view in the Folmar and Newman Gallery

## During Your Visit

[ ](http://web.archive.org/web/20260114090402/https://mmfa.org/art/our-collection/collection-highlights/)

### Our Collection

The Montgomery Museum of Fine Arts is an American art museum with more than 4,000 works of art in its collection.

  * [ __ Learn More ](http://web.archive.org/web/20260114090402/https://mmfa.org/art/our-collection/collection-highlights/)
